breeds.name: German Shepherd
breeds.description: German Shepherd is a breed of medium-size dog that is often considered to be one of the most popular breeds of dog in the United States. It is a breed of working, herding, guarding, search and rescue dog, often used as a guard dog, police dog, farm dog, and military dog. The breed is named after the German Shepherd Dog, a German breed of medium-size working dog that was originally bred for herding. The breed is now popular in the United States and is often referred to as a "German Shepherd" or "German Shepherd Dog."
